entry.def: Thereof is used after a noun to relate that noun to a situation or thing that you have just mentioned.

example.ex: ...his belief in God — or the lack thereof.
example.tran: 他对上帝的信仰——或者不信仰

example.ex: ...a charge of £20 per hour or part thereof.
example.tran: 一小时或不足一小时收费 20 英镑

sentences.en: The Senator of the United States shall be composed of two Senators from each State, chosen by the Legislature thereof, for six years; and each Senator shall have one vote.
sentences.cn: 美国参议院应由每州两名参议员组成，参议员由各州立法机构选送，任期6年，每个参议员应有一个投票权。
